oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The contribution of databases to the results of systematic reviews: a cross-sectional study
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hartling, Lisa
Featherstone, Robin
Nuspl, Megan
Shave, Kassi
Dryden, Donna
Vandermeer, Ben
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We conducted a cross-sectional quantitative analysis to examine the impact of selective database searching on results of meta-analyses. Our sample included systematic reviews with at least one meta-analysis from three Cochrane Review Groups.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Systematic Review
Research Methods
